column2: What is the advantage of the multithreading program?
column3: Enables to utilize the idle and executing time present in most programs
column4: Enables to utilize the idle time present in most programs
column8: Explanation:The principal advantage of multithreading is that it enables us to write very efficient programs because it lets us utilize the idle time that is present in most programs.
